#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(void) {
	string s;
	cin >> s;
	int n = (int)s.length();
	int q;
	cin >> q;
	while (q--) {
		int m, l;
		cin >> m >> l;
		vector<vector<int>> dp(n, vector<int>(m));

		for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {
			dp[i][(s[i] - '0') % m] += 1;
			for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j) {
				if (dp[i][j]) {
					int x = s[i + 1] - '0';
					dp[i + 1][(j * 10 + x) % m] += dp[i][j];
				}
			}
		}

		dp[n - 1][(s[n - 1] - '0') % m] += 1;
		long long int sm = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
			sm += dp[i][l];
		}
		cout << sm << '\n';
	}
}
